Timecandy6.name: Timecandy6
Timecandy6.desc: Thy most coveted of all candies! Gives 72 hours of AFK gains instantly, guaranteed!

EquipmentCape0.name: EquipmentCape0
EquipmentCape0.desc: Gives you a random cape in the game! Can be any of the following: Angel Wings (+11% afk gains), Eggs (+10% dmg), Amarok (+10% Def), Efaunt (+10% Eff), Chizoar (+8% dmg), Troll (+6% all stat), Molten (+30% drop chance)

ObolHyper0.name: ObolHyper0
ObolHyper0.desc: Gives you a random Circle Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +4% DROP RATE, +2% ALL STAT, +3% DAMAGE, and +2% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

desc: Gives you a single 1 Hour Candy. Also, you're not a real adventurer in Flapjack's eyes. Sorry, just tellin' ya like it is!
Gives you a single 1 Hour Candy. One piece of candyyyy!
Each purchase gives +10 daily teleports every day, forever. You can use these on the Map Screen. You can be gone for up to 4 days and claim them all upon your return!
Each purchase gives +13 daily teleports every day, forever. You can use these on the Map Screen. You can be gone for up to 6 days and claim them all upon your return!
